Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2011 09:29PM tj2light wrote: Have never posted anything on here to this point, but have read so many of your heartfelt words and feel so compelled to chime in -  KK you are everyone's favourite for so many different reasons - wit, compassion, experience, encouragement...the list goes on and on.  You inspire everyone to hope for the best, hang in there, stay strong, feel better,  - and that's what everyone wishes for you in return.  Joining in with all the regulars to wish you nothing but the best. <3
Posts.Title: Welcome to my Bizzaro World konakat CapeBretongirl
